title: Champion Tokens and Poor Behaviour History
body:
So I've been chat restricted/banned in the past, all for legimate reasons. So when it says "you are ineligibile for loot" I'm like yeah that's fair enough. I've been smashing out S and S- all week on a variety of champs, mostly of Malzahar and Vel'koz and getting that same prompt, never being rewarded with a champion token. 

Out of nowhere, I just received one for Malzahar, yet I still got the "you've been a bad guy" prompt. 
Did I just break the system with being too good?
